publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5141 Margo MacDonald: Racism in Football—That the Parliament condemns the Scottish Football Association for its failure to honour the standards set by the European Football Association to combat racism in football by its inept and unfair dismissal of the charge of racism levelled against Wayne McIntosh of Whitehill Welfare FC, reportedly heard by players on both sides to direct racially abusive insults towards Dan Gerrard of Spartans FC during an East of Scotland League game on 5 August 2006.
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Robin Harper*, Rosie Kane*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Colin Fox*

S2M-5141 Margo MacDonald: Racism in Football—That the Parliament condemns the Scottish Football Association for its failure to honour the standards set by the European Football Association to combat racism in football by its inept and unfair dismissal of the charge of racism levelled against Wayne McIntosh of Whitehill Welfare FC, reportedly heard by players on both sides to direct racially abusive insults towards Dan Gerrard of Spartans FC during an East of Scotland League game on 5 August 2006. Supported by: Donald Gorrie, Mr Brian Monteith, Robin Harper, Rosie Kane, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Mr Frank McAveety, Colin Fox
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Michael McMahon*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Jackie Baillie*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-5141 Racism in Football (lodged on 13 November 2006) Frances Curran* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
